entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 02:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
